title: Ep. 155 S&A Investor - How to Make Millions "Trend Following"
itunes:title: How to Make Millions "Trend Following"
description: Best-selling author, Michael Covel, talks about his books The Complete Turtle Trader and Trend Following.  Michael interviewed some of the best traders in the world and shares his favorite stories. He also explains how to use technical analysis to make money in both bull and bear markets.
